thread.title: Owner of car detailing service indicted on fraud charge
thread.title_full: Owner of car detailing service indicted on fraud charge - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Owner of car detailing service indicted on fraud charge
text:
BALTIMORE (AP) â€” The owner of a vehicle detailing company has been indicted on charges of defrauding a car rental company of more than half a million dollars.
Forty-six-year-old Lawrence Coleman of Reisterstown was indicted Thursday by a federal grand jury in Baltimore.
According to the indictment, Coleman owned and operated Perfection Plus Auto Detailing and had previously worked for Avis Rent a Car . Prosecutors say Coleman's company had a contract with Avis to prepare cars for rental at BWI Airport .
The indictment alleges that Coleman submitted false invoices to Avis for work that was not done. Prosecutors say Coleman used his knowledge as a former Avis employee to avoid scrutiny, such as submitting individual invoices for than $1,000.
